author: Fextralife
description:
Titan Quest 2 Gameplay Review (Early Access)
https://titanquest2.wiki.fextralife.com/Titan+Quest+2+Wiki
In this Titan Quest 2 video, we're going to be talking about Early Access, which was just released for Titan Quest 2 and was ninja dropped by THQ today at their presentation. So if you didn't hear, you can officially go buy and play Titan Quest 2 early as of right now. I have been playing it for the last few days, and I'm going to talk about my impressions, what I like about it in this video.

0:00 - Titan Quest 2 Early Access Review
0:27 - Titan Quest 2 Early Access Game time
1:02 - Masteries
3:21 - Skill Modifiers
4:50 - Weapons and Armors
6:44 - No Block Mechanic
7:21 - No Enchanting
8:14 - Artstyle and Graphics
9:05 - Good Story
9:38 - Performance
10:50 - My Thoughts on Titan Quest 2 EA
